Cruel Jeremy Kyle Show viewers were in hysterics as a guest who trolls claimed looks like EastEnders ’ Heather Trott was labelled “even worse in person”. 
Sue was on the ITV show to defend her daughter Toni, after gay couple Josh and Ben accused her of being a homophobic stalker. 
Toni had messaged Josh saying he was the father of her child, but he insisted he’d never even met her! 
Her mum came on the stage, shouting at Ben for “lying” about her daughter. 
And he left viewers in hysterics as he simply said: “You’re worse in person!” Read More Sue was defending her daughter Toni on Jeremy Kyle (Photo: ITV) Ben said she was "worse in person" (Photo: ITV) Viewers said she looks like Fat Hev (Photo: ITV) This is Heather Trott 
4 
Many Jeremy Kyle viewers even compared the woman to Chery Fergison’s EastEnders character ‘Fat Hev’ - who got killed off by Ben Mitchell in 2012. 
One troll said: “Heather Trott from eastenders is back from the dead, with new straight hair and on Jeremy Kyle.” 
Another cruel viewer - with a screenshot of Sue - added: “If hagrid and heather trott had a lovechild... it'd definitely end up on #jeremykyle.” 
A third agreed: “Heather Trott hasn’t aged well…” Read More Josh was accusing Toni of being a stalker (Photo: ITV) And it turned out he and Ben were right (Photo: ITV) 
And a fourth added: “She even sounds like Heather from EastEnders!” 
In the end, a lie detector test revealed Toni had indeed lied about Josh being her baby’s dad. 
Since the show, Ben and Josh have had no more contact with Toni or Sue.
